description: Try our easy to follow Pasta With Brussels Sprouts & Bacon recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pasta With Brussels Sprouts & Bacon Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Return bacon to pan, add lemon rind and juice and season with salt and pepper. Add drained pasta, a little of the reserved cooking water and remaining oil and toss to combine. Serve immediately topped with parmesan.
